blog.name: avengers-familyimagines
blog.title: Avengers Family Imagines
blog.description: I write platonic and romantic imagines and fics! involving the Avengers and other Marvel characters. Feel free to request something! Just as a heads up, Imagines I write are small things that are short and sweet and aren’t very descriptive while my Fics are more detailed and story-like.

summary: The Avengers as Conversations I've Overheard at School #1
title: The Avengers as Conversations I've Overheard at School #1
body:
Peter: Mr Stark can I jump off that cliff and end it all?
Tony: No you cannot because then I'd have to jump after you to save you and that's work.
Peter: 
Tony: And then I'd have to do paperwork if you died and I'm not ready for that responsibility
Peter: 
Tony: And then I'd probably get sued for not saving you and then me and Pepper would fight
Tony: And then I'd lose all my money in the court case 
Tony: And then Pepper would probably leave me and I'd end up living in my car
Peter: 
Tony: 
Peter: ᵒᵏᵃʸ ᴵ ʷᵒⁿ'ᵗ ʲᵘᵐᵖ ᴵ ᵍᵘᵉˢˢ

summary: Why I wish we had more info on Tony’s Arc Reactor in Infinity War
title: Why I wish we had more info on Tony’s Arc Reactor in Infinity War
body:
I really, really wish we knew more about how Tony’s reactor works in Infinity War because the two main possibilities makes this scene read really differently:

“If you wanted to have kids, you wouldn’t have done this”

Post IW, a lot of people assumed that the whole suit was in something the size of a cell phone. I saw a lot of talk on multiple internet platforms as to whether not it was detachable. It read visually a lot like something small and maybe held on via magnets.

People theorized about it also taking up the space that the old Arc Reactor in his chest did, but that was head canons to make the new suit make a but more sense.

Now, art book scans have popped up with various takes on the outfits and also the reactor.

Concept art isn’t canon, but it shows the thinking behind the designs. Even in the smallest reactor shown in the concept art, it’s much more than meets the eye and is part of Tony.

Sadly, the scenes where we see RDJ’s chest are soft focus and it’s hard to tell what was intended. In one scene it’s obvious that it’s a prop taped to RDJ, but I don’t think we were supposed to pick up on that. The Russos aren’t as obsessed with visual details as some other MCU directors are.

In the Warren Ellis run on Iron Man, Tony had a suit that forms around him. Some of the material for his suit in stored in his bone marrow. Rather than spreading out from a reactor it seeps of openings across his body that look like extra nipples. It makes sense that they were doing an MCU version of this liquid suit. The more I look at the info we have, the more I think Tony merging a bit with his suit was the actual intent of the film. The Mark 50 is likely based on the Extremis suit from the Warren Ellis run.

Now, back to the Pepper scene. Pepper isn’t keen on the new reactor. If we go with option 1 - the cell phone sized thing maybe taped to his chest - Pepper seems to have come with with a slight case of Generic Superhero Girlfriend Syndrome.

Now consider option 2 - Tony has modified himself to merge himself with the suit. A more realistic approach with a solid grounding in comics lore. Also, a way more secure way to be walking around with that sort of tech. It’s a nice parallel to Stephen Strange and how he used spells to bind his dangerous item to himself. Now, Pepper’s reaction makes more sense. After IM 3, she has good reason to not be thrilled by people becoming one with weapons. Tony likely did the work himself, undoing some of the hard work of surgeons.Option 2 makes it seem like the writers actually paid attention to her character arc rather than ignored it.

Option 1 and Option 2 are completely different beasts. For fic purposes I am going to start assuming Option 2. While I do find it more and more likely that Option 2 was the intent of the film, we really don’t know. I wish we did. It’s a pretty big point for lore, realism and character arcs.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Tomorrowland
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2AP64VA

by captivated

He was eight years old when the mad titan, Thanos, killed his family and his people.

Words: 1262, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Teen Wolf (TV), Guardians of the Galaxy (Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Stiles Stilinski, Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Gamora, Nebula, Peter Quill, Groot, Rocket, Mantis, Drax, Thanos, Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanoff, Clint Barton, Vision, Wanda Maximoff, Stephen Strange, Nick Fury, Maria Hill, Loki, Thor, Sam Wilson, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, James “Bucky” Barnes, Peter Parker
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Stiles Stilinski, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Gamora & Stiles Stilinski, Nebula & Stiles Stilinski, Tony Stark & Stiles Stilinski
  • Additional Tags: Stiles’ birth name is Orion, His mother named him after a star, Stiles is Thanos’ adoptive son, Angst and Hurt/Comfort, Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - PTSD, Implied/Referenced Torture, BAMF Stiles, Stiles is a galaxy class assassin, Stiles & Tony Are BROTP, Stiles Stilinski Has Nightmares, Tony Stark Does What He Wants, Steve Rogers Needs a Hug, Bruce Banner Is a Good Bro, Minor Gamora/Peter Quill, BAMF Nebula (Marvel), Minor Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov, Post-Doctor Strange (2016), Precious Peter Parker, Thanos Can Snap Himself Away, snap, Steve and Stiles are like soulmates, Science Bros Week

blog.name: marvelcomicsguide
blog.title: The Marvel Comics Guide

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: MJ's Weekend At Avengers Tower
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2QvNxD6

by ThatOneSmolFangirl

It was Friday night in Avengers tower, when the elevator dinged, and the doors opened wide. MJ walked in, typing something on her phone, a plastic cup of water in her unoccupied hand and wearing a small backpack. She turned the phone off and put it in her pocket, finally looking up and towards the Avengers, “Sup.” Most of the Avengers were in the living room, preparing for movie night. Peter was in his room, changing into pajamas. Tony stood up quickly, as the other Avengers stayed cautious, eyeing their weapons in case they needed to attack. MJ didn’t seem phased as Tony looked at her quizzically, “Who are you, and how did you get in my building?”
————
In which MJ doesn’t want to spend the weekend alone. Pretty much her bonding with each of the Avengers (including Peter and Bucky)

Words: 2061, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Characters: Michelle Jones, Peter Parker, Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Thor (Marvel), Clint Barton, Other Avengers, Avengers Team (MCU)
  • Additional Tags: Michelle Jones Is a Good Bro, Minor Michelle Jones/Peter Parker, Michelle Jones Needs a Hug, BAMF Michelle Jones, Peter Parker is a Good Bro, Confused Peter Parker, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Friendship, Fluff, Bonding, Team Bonding, I Wrote This Instead of Sleeping, Literally a ton of fluff


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2QvNxD6

title: Double Dates
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2qwc7sc

by natashasbanner

When Tony asked them to go to the movies with him and Pepper, Bruce didn’t think he meant a movie premiere. The spotlight was never really their thing.

blog.name: bainwen
blog.title: The Adventures of Princess Puppysquee
blog.description: Hockey, the MCU, Star Wars, Agents of SHIELD, Harry Potter, puppies, books, maybe a few other things. Bi, she/her. In between the Millennials & Gen Xers. Trying to increase the intersectionality of my feminism day by day.

Shipping Tony Stark with happiness.

WinterIron/Stuckony/Stony slut... mainly WinterIron tho.

summary: Tony is sick of Pepper picking out his dates for events (“I’m a grown man.” “No strippers.” “Pepper, dancing is an honest job...
body:
Tony is sick of Pepper picking out his dates for events (“I’m a grown man.” “No strippers.” “Pepper, dancing is an honest job and takes a lot of-“ “Tony.”) and so he does the only rational thing. He gets drunk and orders an online Russian bride. In Natalia’s profile, yes he read it, she says she has a brother that she wants to come with her. When he scrolls to the next picture his brain practically short circuited, because holy shit. Her brother is fucking gorgeous; he’s tall and muscular with stormy, grey eyes and a scowl that makes Tony feel all tingly inside. He’s probably not really her brother and it’s just a scheme for Natalia to bring her lover to the states, but Tony doesn’t give a shit. He’d do anything to see that glare in person.

Tony’s never made a payment faster in his life than he did now (he’ll worry about making getting them permanent visas later).

summary:
DST's latest Marvel Select Iron Man is their first based on Infinity War
 Infinity War meets the Disney Store with Diamond...
caption:
DST’s latest Marvel Select Iron Man is their first based on Infinity War

Infinity War meets the Disney Store with Diamond Select’s latest. Infinity War Iron Man will be exclusive to the house of the mouse. The armored Avenger Is Iron Man the biggest and most well-known hero in the Marvel Cinematic Universe? Probably. And so this isn’t exactly old…
